name: Benji's Adventure
description:
You're a robot your owner has been kidnapped you have to find him! There will be around 5 big maps. First one the hub owners home and neighbourhood and map selection, second is going to be a supermarket 3,4,5 aren't planned yet. The game will be completly free and have pretty cool mechanics.

Update 1 - Early alpha released keep in mind that its not optimized so it can stutter a lot.
